amendment.description: To amend section 41703 of title 49, United States Code, to support the United States presence in the global cargo industry.

vote.text: Amendment SA 923 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 923 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S7819; text: CR S7819) To amend section 41703 of title 49, United States Code, to support the United States presence in the global cargo industry.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 923 proposed by Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 923 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
